title: How It Works
description: Our personalized children's books are truly one of a kind. The combination of AI and the collaborative efforts of artists, authors, and educators ensures that each book is tailored to the needs, developmental timeline, interests and likeness of the child. Our beautiful premium books will help your child explore their imagination, develop their creativity and promote a lifelong love of reading.

Step1.title: Scan
Step1.description: Choose to use our face scanning app or upload your own photos

Step2.title: Generate
Step2.description: In under one hour, you will receive an email containing an eBook version of the book to be printed.  You then have 48hrs to confirm we met (or exceeded) your standards!

Step3.title: Ship
Step3.description: Depending on your choice of shipping method, expect to receive your book in as short as 1-3 business days or as long as 5-12 business days
